summary: In 1964, a teenage girl in search of the truth about her mother runs away to a small town in South Carolina and finds a family of independent women who can connect her to her past.
cast: Dakota Fanning|Queen Latifah|Jennifer Hudson|Alicia Keys|Sophie Okonedo|Paul Bettany|Hilarie Burton|Tristan Mack Wilds|Nate Parker|Shondrella Avery|Renee Ford Clark|Sharon Conley|Nicky Buggs|Jasmine Burke|Emma Sage Bowman|Emily Alyn Lind|Addy Miller|Taylor Kowalski|Bob Hungerford|Richard Todd Sullivan|Chris Moore|Bill Oberst Jr.|Cullen Moss|Walt Elder|Dan Beene|Joe Chrest|Robin Mullins|Tom Conder|Jay Pearson|Dan Cox|Quentin Kerr|Kimberly Bailey|Doug Burch|Cathy Cavadini|Lanei Chapman|Barbara Harris|Amad Jackson|Thomas Lambert|Terence Mathews|Jeremy Maxwell|Alan Oppenheimer|Richard Penn|Noreen Reardon|Cheryl Tyre Smith|Chevy Lamont Cofield|Lyndon B. Johnson|Linwood Mooring|Lindsey Sherrin|Matthew Landon Sparks
title: La vida secreta de las abejas
